author: spoole
msg: updated katoHProfAdapterPOC to make it an eclipse project

author: vhennebert
msg: Bugfix: use the effective color profile supplied by the ImageEncodingHelper, instead of the original one.

author: vhennebert
msg: Switched from linear RGB to sRGB for the fallback color model, in order to avoid trouble with some images (CMYK TIFF, for example).

author: jleroux
msg: See http://markmail.org/message/znytl2y4inpmxbdo (David Goodenough's advice on copyright update)

extract : "My understanding of the Berne Convention rules for Copyright (which covers most jurisdictions - even the USA now), is that the copyright period only gets extended when the copyrighted item gets updated."
